# Polymarket API Documentation

This directory contains comprehensive documentation for the Polymarket API endpoints extracted from the official documentation at https://docs.polymarket.com

## Categories

- [Sports](./sports/) - Sports-related endpoints
- [Tags](./tags/) - Tag management endpoints
- [Events](./events/) - Event-related endpoints
- [Markets](./markets/) - Market-related endpoints
- [Series](./series/) - Series-related endpoints
- [Comments](./comments/) - Comment-related endpoints
- [Search](./search/) - Search functionality endpoints

## Documentation Structure

Each endpoint documentation includes:
- HTTP Method and Endpoint Path
- Query Parameters (with types, requirements, and constraints)
- Response Schema (with types and nullability)
- Example Responses
- Additional notes and constraints

All documentation is maintained in Markdown format for easy integration with the codebase.
